s:patient presents with 2 days history of hoarseness, critical cough, critical regurgitation and Stomach. patient is a 53 YO male cryptographer. describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 3 years in his past he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life o:Height 163 cm, Weight 72 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 90, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17, Abdomen = Tender epigastric with no rebound a:GERD p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Nexium - 80 mg po bid x 8 weeks, and ordered transhiatal esophagectomy - esophagus.
